filesystem



FileSystemObjectType

type: C enum
description: file system object type
FSO_FILE file object
FSO_LINK link object
FSO_DIR directory object
FSO_COUNT

FileSystemObject

typedef struct {
  FileSystemObjectType type;
  PathArray            path;
} FileSystemObject;
type: C struct
description: file system object, type & path

c_dir_exists

bool c_dir_exists(const char *dir);
type: C function
description: check if directory exists

c_dir_touch

bool c_dir_touch(const char *dir);
type: C function
description: touch directory

c_dir_mk

bool c_dir_mk(const char* dir);
type: C function
description: make directory (create parent directories if they don't exist)

c_dir_delete

bool c_dir_delete(const char *dir, bool delete_subdirectories);
type: C function
description: delete directory

c_dir_copy

bool c_dir_copy(const char *src, const char *dst);
type: C function
description: copy content from src to dst

c_dir_copy_ex

bool c_dir_copy_ex(const char *src, const char *dst, bool copy_sudirectories);
type: C function
description: copy content from src to dst WARNING function allocates memory

c_dir_compare

bool c_dir_compare(const char *dir_a, const char* dir_b);
type: C function
description: returns true if dir_b contains contents of dir_a

c_dir_list

FileSystemObject* c_dir_list(const char *dir, bool search_subdirectories);
type: C function
description: list directory items, returns vector of FileSystemObject

c_dir_list_filter

FileSystemObject* c_dir_list_filter(const char *dir, const char *filter, bool search_subdirectories);
type: C function
description: list directory items based on filter, returns vector of FileSystemObject

c_dir_list_filter_fixed

bool c_dir_list_filter_fixed(const char *dir, const char *filter, FileSystemObject* buffer, size_t *bufferSize);
type: C function
description: list diretcory items in fixed FSO buffer

description: perform a binary copy of src to dst

c_file_binary_compare

type: C function
description: binary comparison between src & dst
